name: DirectLDLCholesterol
title: Direct LDL Cholesterol
purpose: (Clinical Focus: The purpose of this value set is to represent concepts for laboratory tests that directly measure low-density lipoprotein cholesterol (LDL-C) in serum or plasma.),(Data Element Scope: This value set may use a model element related to Laboratory Test.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes concepts for LDL-C laboratory tests in serum or plasma, expressed in mass per volume units (e.g., mg/dL), where the measurement is obtained directly and not derived using  mathematical equations based on other lipid values (i.e., total cholesterol, HDL-C, and triglycerides). Concepts included do not specify a value in the Method field within the LOINC clinical laboratory terminology.),(Exclusion Criteria: Excludes LDL-C tests that are derived using mathematical equations based on other lipid values (i.e., total cholesterol, HDL-C, and triglycerides) and that specify “calculated” in the Method field within the LOINC clinical laboratory terminology.)
